Package StyleSheets.BaseComponents

Class RuleSet

java.lang.Object
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.Statement
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.RuleSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlexBox, Grid
public class RuleSet
extends Statement
Defines a CSS rule set that represents a block of CSS statements, including the selector and curly braces. The general syntax is @SELECTOR {STATEMENTS}
